snippet: Oliver Hartung's photos from 2007 through 2009 evidence the omnipresence of the Assad dynasty in Syria and its psychological grip on the people, and also how that presence - and the nation itself - has changed dramatically since.
abstract: Oliver Hartung's photos from 2007 through 2009 evidence the omnipresence of the Assad dynasty in Syria and its psychological grip on the people, and also how that presence - and the nation itself - has changed dramatically since.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
